aws::graph::propositions: # Meteorological Information and Flight Plan for Accident Near Salt Lake City International Airport
Conditions at the accident site were Visual Meteorological Conditions (VMC).
The condition of light at the accident site was night.
The observation facility was Salt Lake City International Airport (KSLC).
Salt Lake City International Airport (KSLC) is at an elevation of 4,225 feet above mean sea level.
The observation facility was 1 nautical mile from the accident site.
The observation time was 23:54 local time.
The observation facility was 145 degrees from the accident site.
The lowest cloud condition was few clouds at 23,000 feet above ground level.
Visibility at the accident site was 10 miles.
No ceiling was reported.
No Runway Visual Range (RVR) was reported.
Wind speed was 6 knots.
No wind gusts were reported.
No turbulence was forecasted.
No actual turbulence was reported.
Wind direction was 270 degrees.
No turbulence severity was forecasted.
No actual turbulence severity was reported.
The altimeter setting was 30.36 inches of mercury.
The temperature was 12 degrees Celsius.
The dew point was -1 degree Celsius.
There was no obscuration at the accident site.
There was no precipitation at the accident site.
The departure point was Afton, Wyoming (AFO).
No flight plan was filed.
The destination was Salt Lake City, Utah (SLC).
The type of clearance was traffic advisory.
The departure time was 05:38 local time.
The type of airspace was Class B.

text:
# Meteorological Information and Flight Plan

Conditions at Accident Site: Visual (VMC)
Condition of Light: Night

Observation Facility, Elevation: KSLC,4225 ft msl
Distance from Accident Site: 1 Nautical Miles

Observation Time: 23:54 Local
Direction from Accident Site: 145

Lowest Cloud Condition: Few / 23000 ft AGL
Visibility: 10 miles

Lowest Ceiling:
Visibility (RVR):

Wind Speed/Gusts: 6 knots / 
Turbulence Type Forecast/Actual: None / None

Wind Direction: 270
Turbulence Severity Forecast/Actual: N/A / N/A

Altimeter Setting: 30.36 inches Hg
Temperature/Dew Point: 12C / -1C

Precipitation and Obscuration: No Obscuration; No Precipitation

Departure Point: Afton, WY (AFO )
Type of Flight Plan Filed: None

Destination: Salt Lake City, UT (SLC )
Type of Clearance: Traffic advisory

Departure Time: 05:38 Local
Type of Airspace: Class B

---
